text: usane tumhaare lie svayan tumheen mein se ek misaal pesh kee hai. kya jo rozee hamane tumhen dee hai, usamen tumhaare adheenasthon mein se, kuchh tumhaare saajheedaar hai ki tum sab usamen baraabar ke ho, tum unaka aisa dar rakhate ho jaisa apane logon ka dar rakhate ho? - isaprakaar ham un logon ke lie aayaten khol-kholakar prastut karate hai jo buddhi se kaam lete hai.
